summary.span: 傳回目前已安裝在系統上的語音合成 (文字轉換語音) 語音集合。

span.span: Returns the collection of speech synthesis (text-to-speech) voices that are currently installed on the system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當應用程式呼叫，此方法會驗證語音 （文字轉換語音引擎） 的每個找到的中登錄符合某些最小的準則。When an application calls , the method verifies that each of the voices (engines for text-to-speech) it finds in the registry meets certain minimum criteria. 無法驗證任何語音設定其屬性`False`。For any voice that fails verification, sets its property to `False`. 應用程式無法選取語音其屬性是`False`。An application cannot select a voice whose property is `False`. 一般而言，應用程式將不會設定語音屬性。Typically, applications will not set a voice’s property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event PhonemeReached As EventHandler(Of PhonemeReachedEventArgs)

summary.span: 到達音素時引發。

span.span: Raised when a phoneme is reached.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 音素是基本的撰寫語言元件，通常代表一或多個相異的音效英文字母 （或兩個字母的組合） 的字母。A phoneme is a basic component of written language, typically a letter of an alphabet (or the combination of two letters) that represents one or more distinct sounds. 例如，字母"c"是似乎像是中 「 cinder"、"s"或"k"在"catch"像音素。For example, the letter "c" is a phoneme that may sound like "s" in "cinder", or like "k" in "catch". 書寫的文字是音素的組合。A written word is an assemblage of phonemes. 在 word 變更音素會改變其拼字檢查。Changing a phoneme in a word will alter its spelling. A執行個體會產生單字構成音素的每個部分的事件。A instance generates a event for each portion of a word that constitutes a phoneme. 例如，word 「 主題 」 會產生三個"th"音效、 另一個用於"e"聲音，和另一個用於"m"聲音 (me); 事件。For example, for the word "theme" would generate three events; one for the "th" sound, one for the "e" sound, and one for the "m" sound (me). 如需範例和資料與事件相關聯的相關資訊，請參閱。For an example and information about data associated with the event, see .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SelectVoice(string name) cil managed

span.span: The name of the voice to select.

summary.span: 依名稱選取特定的語音。

span.span: Selects a specific voice by name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法和類別，以取得安裝可選取的文字轉換語音 (TTS) 語音。Use the method and class to obtain the names of installed text-to-speech (TTS) voices that you can select. 若要選取語音，請傳送的整個內容屬性做為引數方法。To select a voice, pass the entire contents of the property as the argument for the method. 物件會選取第一個已安裝的語音，其中包含`name`的語音屬性。The object selects the first installed voice that contains `name` in the voice's property. 執行區分大小寫，子字串比較來決定是否要符合的語音`name`。The performs a case-sensitive, substring comparison to determine if the voice matches the `name`. 當應用程式呼叫，此方法會驗證每個在登錄中找到的語音符合某些最小的準則。When an application calls , the method verifies that each of the voices it finds in the registry meets certain minimum criteria. 無法驗證任何語音設定其屬性`False`。For any voice that fails verification, sets its property to `False`. 應用程式無法選取語音其屬性是`False`。An application cannot select a voice whose property is `False`. 一般而言，應用程式將不會設定語音屬性。Typically, applications will not set a voice’s property. 若要選取語音的性別、 年齡或地區設定，請使用其中一種方法。To select a voice by gender, age, or locale, use one of the methods.

summary.span: 選取特定特性的語音。

span.span: Selects a voice with specific characteristics.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法和類別，以取得安裝可選取的文字轉換語音 (TTS) 語音。Use the method and class to obtain the names of installed text-to-speech (TTS) voices that you can select. 物件會選取第一個已安裝的語音符合指定的特性。The object selects the first installed voice that matches the specified characteristics. 當應用程式呼叫，此方法會驗證每個在登錄中找到的語音符合某些最小的準則。When an application calls , the method verifies that each of the voices it finds in the registry meets certain minimum criteria. 無法驗證任何語音設定其屬性`False`。For any voice that fails verification, sets its property to `False`. 應用程式無法選取語音其屬性是`False`。An application cannot select a voice whose property is `False`. 一般而言，應用程式將不會設定語音屬性。Typically, applications will not set a voice’s property. 若要依名稱選取語音，使用方法To select a voice by name, use the method

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法和類別，以取得安裝可選取的文字轉換語音 (TTS) 語音。Use the method and class to obtain the names of installed text-to-speech (TTS) voices that you can select. 物件會選取第一個已安裝的語音其屬性相符項目`gender`參數。The object selects the first installed voice whose property matches the `gender` parameter. 當應用程式呼叫，此方法會驗證每個在登錄中找到的語音符合某些最小的準則。When an application calls , the method verifies that each of the voices it finds in the registry meets certain minimum criteria. 無法驗證任何語音設定其屬性`False`。For any voice that fails verification, sets its property to `False`. 應用程式無法選取語音其屬性是`False`。An application cannot select a voice whose property is `False`. 一般而言，應用程式將不會設定語音屬性。Typically, applications will not set a voice’s property. 若要選取其他特性為基礎的語音，請參閱其他方法。To select a voice based on other characteristics, see the other methods. 若要依名稱選取語音，使用方法。To select a voice by name, use the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法和類別，以取得安裝可選取的文字轉換語音 (TTS) 語音。Use the method and class to obtain the names of installed text-to-speech (TTS) voices that you can select. 物件，會發現安裝 voices 其和屬性比對`gender`和`age`參數。The object finds installed voices whose and properties match the `gender` and `age` parameters. 計算的符合項目它發現，並傳回語音，當計數等於`voiceAlternate`參數。The counts the matches it finds, and returns the voice when the count equals the `voiceAlternate` parameter. 當應用程式呼叫，此方法會驗證每個在登錄中找到的語音符合某些最小的準則。When an application calls , the method verifies that each of the voices it finds in the registry meets certain minimum criteria. 無法驗證任何語音設定其屬性`False`。For any voice that fails verification, sets its property to `False`. 應用程式無法選取語音其屬性是`False`。An application cannot select a voice whose property is `False`. 一般而言，應用程式將不會設定語音屬性。Typically, applications will not set a voice’s property. 若要選取其他特性為基礎的語音，請參閱其他多載。To select a voice based on other characteristics, see the other overloads. 若要依名稱選取語音，使用方法。To select a voice by name, use the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件尋找 voices 其， ，和屬性比對`gender`， `age`，和`culture`參數。The object finds voices whose , , and properties match the `gender`, `age`, and `culture` parameters. 計算的符合項目它發現，並傳回語音，當計數等於`voiceAlternate`參數。The counts the matches it finds, and returns the voice when the count equals the `voiceAlternate` parameter. Microsoft Windows 和 System.Speech API 接受所有有效國家 （地區） 語言代碼。Microsoft Windows and the System.Speech API accept all valid language-country codes. 若要執行使用中所指定語言的文字轉換語音`culture`參數、 語音合成引擎支援，必須安裝語言國家/地區的程式碼。To perform text-to-speech using the language specified in the `culture` parameter, a speech synthesis engine that supports that language-country code must be installed. 隨附於 Microsoft Windows 7 的語音合成引擎使用下列語言的國家/地區代碼：The speech synthesis engines that shipped with Microsoft Windows 7 work with the following language-country codes: - EN-US。en-US. 英文 （美國）English (United States) - zh-chs 和 CN。zh-CN. 中文 （中國）Chinese (China) - zh-chs 和 TW。zh-TW. 中文 （台灣）Chinese (Taiwan) 也允許兩個字母的語言代碼，例如"en-us"。Two-letter language codes such as "en" are also permitted. 當應用程式呼叫，此方法會驗證每個在登錄中找到的語音符合某些最小的準則。When an application calls , the method verifies that each of the voices it finds in the registry meets certain minimum criteria. 無法驗證任何語音設定其屬性`False`。For any voice that fails verification, sets its property to `False`. 應用程式無法選取語音其屬性是`False`。An application cannot select a voice whose property is `False`. 一般而言，應用程式將不會設定語音屬性。Typically, applications will not set a voice’s property. 若要選取其他特性為基礎的語音，請參閱其他多載。To select a voice based on other characteristics, see the other overloads. 若要依名稱選取語音，使用方法。To select a voice by name, use the method.

summary.span: 以同步方式從字串、 物件或 物件產生語音輸出。

span.span: Generates speech output synchronously from a string, a object, or a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法以同步方式產生語音。The methods generate speech synchronously. 方法不會傳回之前的內容完全說出執行個體。The methods do not return until the content of the instance has been completely spoken. 這是最簡單的方式來產生語音。This is the simplest way to generate speech. 不過，如果您的應用程式需要時執行工作，例如反白顯示文字、 繪製動畫，監視控制項或其他工作，使用方法或方法來以非同步方式產生語音。However, if your application needs to perform tasks while speaking, for example highlight text, paint animation, monitor controls, or other tasks, use the methods or the method to generate speech asynchronously. 在這種方法，呼叫可能會引發下列事件：During a call to this method, the can raise the following events: - 。. 讀出合成器的狀態變更時引發。Raised when the speaking state of the synthesizer changes. - 。. 合成器開始產生語音時引發。Raised when the synthesizer begins generating speech. - 。. 合成器到達字母或構成的個別音效的語音語言的字母組合，每次引發。Raised each time the synthesizer reaches a letter or combination of letters that constitute a discreet sound of speech in a language. - 。. 每次引發合成器完成讀出的文字。Raised each time the synthesizer completes speaking a word. - 。. 每次引發語音的輸出，則需要在說話或用來產生語音臉部 muscles 的位置變更。Raised each time spoken output requires a change in the position of the mouth or the facial muscles used to produce speech. - 。. 合成器遇到提示字元中的書籤時所引發。Raised when the synthesizer encounters a bookmark in a prompt. - 。. 讀出的語音合成器的變更時引發。Raised when the speaking voice for the synthesizer changes. 不會引發時處理的任何事件方法。The does not raise the event while processing any of the methods.

summary.span: 以非同步方式從字串、 物件或 物件產生語音輸出。

span.span: Generates speech output asynchronously from a string, a object, or a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法以非同步方式產生語音。The methods generate speech asynchronously. 方法會立即傳回而不需等待的內容来說完物件。The methods return immediately without waiting for the content of the object to finish speaking. 使用如果您的應用程式需要時執行工作，例如反白顯示文字，繪製動畫、 監視控制項或其他工作。Use if your application needs to perform tasks while speaking, for example highlight text, paint animation, monitor controls, or other tasks. 在這種方法，呼叫可能會引發下列事件：During a call to this method, the can raise the following events: - 。. 讀出合成器的狀態變更時引發。Raised when the speaking state of the synthesizer changes. - 。. 合成器開始產生語音時引發。Raised when the synthesizer begins generating speech. - 。. 合成器到達字母或構成的個別音效的語音語言的字母組合，每次引發。Raised each time the synthesizer reaches a letter or combination of letters that constitute a discreet sound of speech in a language. - 。. 每次引發合成器完成讀出的文字。Raised each time the synthesizer completes speaking a word. - 。. 每次引發語音的輸出，則需要在說話或用來產生語音臉部 muscles 的位置變更。Raised each time spoken output requires a change in the position of the mouth or the facial muscles used to produce speech. - 。. 合成器遇到提示字元中的書籤時所引發。Raised when the synthesizer encounters a bookmark in a prompt. - 。. 讀出的語音合成器的變更時引發。Raised when the speaking voice for the synthesizer changes. - 。. 合成器完成時引發作業。Raised when the synthesizer finishes a operation. 如果您的應用程式不需要執行工作時，您可以使用方法或方法來以同步方式產生語音。If your application does not need to perform tasks while speaking, you can use the methods or the method to generate speech synchronously.

summary.span: 取消已佇列提示的非同步合成作業。

span.span: Cancels the asynchronous synthesis operation for a queued prompt.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您也可以使用這個方法來取消非同步說話下列作業：You can also use this method to cancel an asynchronous speak operation for the following: - 內容所指定方法。The contents of a specified by a method. - 內容所指定方法。The contents of a specified by a method. - 內容包含所指定的 SSML方法。The contents of a containing SSML specified by a method. 當您呼叫， ，或，System.Speech 建立物件，並填入內容的方法的參數，然後傳回物件。When you call , , or , System.Speech creates a object and populates it with the contents of the method's parameter, and returns the object. 如果您保留一份傳回，您可以傳遞到取消讀出的內容中指定或物件。If you retain a copy of the returned , you can pass it into to cancel speaking content specified in a or a object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SpeakAsyncCancelAll() cil managed

summary.span: 取消所有已佇列、非同步的語音合成作業。

span.span: Cancels all queued, asynchronous, speech synthesis operations.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event SpeakCompleted As EventHandler(Of SpeakCompletedEventArgs)

summary.span: 完成讀出提示時引發。

span.span: Raised when the completes the speaking of a prompt.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件完成後的任何或方法。The raises the event at the completion of any of the or methods. 類別沒有屬性，而且不傳回資料來源事件。The class has no properties, and does not return data from the event. 它可讓應用程式作者撰寫事件處理常式，如事件。It is provided to enable application authors to write event handlers for the event.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event SpeakProgress As EventHandler(Of SpeakProgressEventArgs)

span.span: Raised after the speaks each individual word of a prompt.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發這個事件，它使用任何的提示字元中，說出每個新字， ， ，或方法。The raises this event for each new word that it speaks in a prompt using any of the , , , or methods. 如需範例和相關聯的事件資料的詳細資訊，請參閱。For an example and more information about data associated with the event, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event SpeakStarted As EventHandler(Of SpeakStartedEventArgs)

summary.span: 開始讀出提示時引發。

span.span: Raised when the begins the speaking of a prompt.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發這個事件時就會開始處理使用的任何提示， ， ，或方法。The raises this event when it begins processing a prompt using any of the , , , or methods. 類別沒有屬性，而且不傳回資料來源事件。The class has no properties, and does not return data from the event. 它可讓應用程式作者撰寫事件處理常式，如事件。It is provided to enable application authors to write event handlers for the event.

summary.span: 變更 的狀態時引發。

span.span: Raised when the state of the changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發這個事件時它說話變更。The raises this event when its speaking changes. 如需範例和相關聯的事件資料的詳細資訊，請參閱。For an example and more information about data associated with the event, see . 若要暫停及繼續語音合成器，請使用和方法。To pause and resume speech synthesis, use the and methods.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event VisemeReached As EventHandler(Of VisemeReachedEventArgs)

summary.span: 到達視素 (Viseme) 時引發。

span.span: Raised when a viseme is reached.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Viseme 時說音素基本說話和圖示的位置。A viseme is the basic position of the mouth and face when pronouncing a phoneme. Visemes 是音素的視覺化呈現。Visemes are visual representations of phonemes. System.Speech 支援 21 visemes 美式英文，其中每一個都對應至一或多個的音素。System.Speech supports 21 visemes for US English, each of which corresponds to one or more phonemes. 當達到新音素具有不同的對應 viseme 比前一個音素達到時，會引發事件。 events are raised when a new phoneme reached has a different corresponding viseme than the previous phoneme reached. 因為某些 visemes 代表一個以上的音素如果下一個音素到達對應至為前一個音素相同 viseme 不產生事件。Since some visemes represent more than one phoneme, a event is not generated if the next phoneme reached corresponds to the same viseme as the previous phoneme. 例如，對於口語 「 此區域 」， "this"中的"s"和"z"「 區域 」 中的就會引發事件。For example, for the spoken words "this zone", a event is raised for the "s" in "this" and the "z" in "zone". 不過，因為它會對應至相同的 viseme 為"this"中的"s"，"z"中 「 區域 」 不引發事件。However, a event is not raised for the "z" in "zone" because it corresponds to the same viseme as the "s" in "this". 以下是 21 SAPI 音素轉換和對應於 U.S.english viseme 音素群組的清單。The following is a list of the 21 SAPI phonemes and phoneme groups that correspond to a viseme in US English. |VisemeViseme|Phoneme(s)Phoneme(s)| |------------|------------------| |00|無回應silence| |11|ae，ax，ahae, ax, ah| |22|aaaa| |33|aoao| |44|金鑰，eh，喔ey, eh, uh| |55|erer| |66|y、 iy、 kartris、 ixy, iy, ih, ix| |77|w、 uww, uw| |88|oow| |99|全都aw| |1010|oyoy| |1111|結果ay| |1212|hh| |1313|rr| |1414|ll| |1515|s, zs, z| |1616|sh，ch、 jh、 zh-chs 和sh, ch, jh, zh| |1717|th、 dhth, dh| |1818|f、 vf, v| |1919|d、 t、 nd, t, n| |2020|k、 g、 ngk, g, ng| |2121|p、 b、 mp, b, m| 如需與相關聯的資料`VisemeReached`事件，請參閱。For information about data associated with the `VisemeReached` event, see .
